016package app.supernaut.fx.test;
017
018import app.supernaut.fx.FxForegroundApp;
019import javafx.application.Platform;
020import javafx.stage.Stage;
021import org.slf4j.Logger;
022import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;
023
024/**
025 * No-op ForegroundApp which exits immediately (used for testing)
026 */
027public final class NoopFxForegroundApp implements FxForegroundApp {
028    private static final Logger log = LoggerFactory.getLogger(NoopFxForegroundApp.class);
029
030    @Override
031    public void start(Stage primaryStage) {
032        log.info("Entered");
033        primaryStage.show();
034        noop();
035    }
036    
037    private void noop() {
038        log.info("Calling Plaform.exit()");
039        Platform.exit();    // Exit OpenJFX
040    }
041}
